title: havn't seen a red post in a while
body:
riot r u k
do u need some oranges

replies.body: Think rioters are in shark infested waters since preseason patch

omg a red posted <3 hi i'm doing great
;D
Doing pretty well. Got to try out some really cool new Corki build paths including the new Essence Reaver.
i'd be fine if it wasn't for this 15 min groupfinder que, but other than that peachy. Thanks for asking. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
It's not uncommon on the weekends. They'll pick back up on Monday

Check out [Surrender@20's Red Post Collection](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/11/red-post-collection-all-star-2015.html) for a consolidation of important Red activity from the LoL boards, Reddit, Twitter etc.
